stories.title: Create basic home page component
stories.description: Create the root home page at src/app/page.tsx with the marketing content structure
acceptance_criteria: File exists at src/app/page.tsx
Page displays 'Founders Tab' as the main heading with gradient text styling
Page displays a one-line tagline describing the product
Page displays 3 value proposition bullet points
Page displays a brief supporting text about target audience
Page is styled according to DESIGN_SYSTEM.md (dark mode, proper spacing, typography)

stories.title: Add CTA buttons linking to auth pages
stories.description: Add Get Started and Log In buttons that navigate to signup and login pages
acceptance_criteria: Primary 'Get Started' button is present and links to /signup
Secondary 'Log In' button is present and links to /login
Buttons are styled per DESIGN_SYSTEM.md (primary and outline/secondary variants)
Buttons stack vertically on mobile (below lg breakpoint)
Buttons display side-by-side on desktop (lg breakpoint and above)
Buttons are keyboard accessible

stories.title: Add authenticated user redirect
stories.description: Authenticated users visiting the home page should be redirected to the main app
acceptance_criteria: Home page uses the useAuth hook to check authentication status
Authenticated users are automatically redirected to /expenses
Loading state shows a spinner while checking auth status
Unauthenticated users see the marketing content without delay

stories.title: Responsive layout and centering
stories.description: Ensure the home page is properly centered and responsive across all viewports
acceptance_criteria: Content is vertically and horizontally centered on all screen sizes
Generous vertical spacing between elements (following DESIGN_SYSTEM.md spacing scale)
Page looks good on mobile (375px width)
Page looks good on tablet (768px width)
Page looks good on desktop (1024px+ width)
No horizontal scrolling on any viewport

stories.title: Add E2E tests for home page
stories.description: Create Playwright tests to verify home page functionality
acceptance_criteria: Test file exists at tests/e2e/home-page.spec.ts
Test verifies the home page loads with expected content
Test verifies 'Get Started' button navigates to /signup
Test verifies 'Log In' button navigates to /login
Test verifies authenticated users are redirected away from home page
All tests pass when running npx playwright test tests/e2e/home-page.spec.ts
